io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.world2d

Interface World

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ABTNetWorld, ABTWorld, ChunkWorld, WorldFromImage, WorldWrapper

    public interface World

    An interface for classes storing world data.

    Layers are indexed by their z value with a lower z value being higher up

    Author:
    Tomaso2468

    • Method Detail

      • getTile

        Tile getTile(long x,
             long y,
             long z)
        Gets the tile at a specified position.
        Parameters:
        x - The X position to read from.
        y - The Y position to read from.
        z - The Z (layer) position to read from.
        Returns:
        a non-null tile instance.

      • getTileState

        java.lang.String getTileState(long x,
                              long y,
                              long z)
        Gets the state data of a tile at a specified position.
        Parameters:
        x - The X position to read from.
        y - The Y position to read from.
        z - The Z (layer) position to read from.
        Returns:
        a string representing a state or an empty string (null may not be returned).

      • setTile

        void setTile(long x,
             long y,
             long z,
             Tile tile,
             java.lang.String state)
        Sets the tile at a specified position.
        Parameters:
        x - The X position to write to.
        y - The Y position to write to.
        z - The Z (layer) position to write to.
        tile - A non-null tile instance.
        state - a string representing a state or an empty string (null may not be set).

      • setState

              long y,
              long z,
              java.lang.String state)
        Sets the state of a tile.
        Parameters:
        x - The X position to write to.
        y - The Y position to write to.
        z - The Z (layer) position to write to.
        state - a string representing a state or an empty string (null may not be set).

      • setAreaID

        void setAreaID(long x,
               long y,
               long z,
               java.lang.String id)
        Sets the area ID at a specified position. This can be used to determine music for specified areas in open world games.
        Parameters:
        x - The X position to write to.
        y - The Y position to write to.
        z - The Z (layer) position to write to.
        id - The ID of the area or null to remove area data.

      • getAreaID

        java.lang.String getAreaID(long x,
                           long y,
                           long z)
        Gets the area ID at a specified position. This can be used to determine music for specified areas in open world games.
        Parameters:
        x - The X position to read from.
        y - The Y position to read from.
        z - The Z (layer) position to read from.
        Returns:
        The ID of the area or null if no area data exists.

      • setBiomeID

        void setBiomeID(long x,
                long y,
                long z,
                int id)
        Sets the biome ID at a specified location. This can be used in open world games with generated terrain or for setting theming for different areas.
        Parameters:
        x - The X position to write to.
        y - The Y position to write to.
        z - The Z (layer) position to write to.
        id - A biome index usually from an enum or array.

      • getBiomeID

        int getBiomeID(long x,
               long y,
               long z)
        Gets the biome ID at a specified location. This can be used in open world games with generated terrain or for setting theming for different areas.
        Parameters:
        x - The X position to read from.
        y - The Y position to read from.
        z - The Z (layer) position to read from.
        Returns:
        A biome index usually from an enum or array.

      • doUpdateClient

        default void doUpdateClient()
        A method where client-side updates should be performed (e.g. unloading).

      • doUpdateServer

        default void doUpdateServer()
        A method where server-side updates should be performed (e.g. unloading). Normally, this method calls doUpdateClient at a slower rate.

      • getLightColor

        default org.newdawn.slick.Color getLightColor()
        Gets the ambient light color of this level.
        Returns:
        A color object.

      • save

        default void save()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Saves the level data.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurs writing data.
